item.title: How can i change my total lvl to 126
item.dc:creator: @IAsk IAsk
item.description:
@IAsk wrote:

Hi i’m IAsk,
You can search “Max Xp Reached” Then change the “99500000” to the correct experience for level 126.

item.title: How can i change my total lvl to 126
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("allstats") && (playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[5]), 5); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[6]), 6); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[7]), 7); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[8]), 8); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[9]), 9); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[10]), 10); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[11]), 11); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[12]), 12); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[13]), 13); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[14]), 14); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[15]), 15); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[16]), 16); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[17]), 17); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[18]), 18); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[19]), 19); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[20]), 20); sendMessage("You own :P"); }

Looks great, now only take away the ( before playerRights else you will get a hella errors

Read full topic

item.title: How can i change my total lvl to 126
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

Make it like this : if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("allstats") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[5]), 5); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[6]), 6); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[7]), 7); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[8]), 8); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[9]), 9); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[10]), 10); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[11]), 11); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[12]), 12); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[13]), 13); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[14]), 14); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[15]), 15); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[16]), 16); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[17]), 17); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[18]), 18); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[19]), 19); addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[20]), 20); sendMessage("You own :P"); } I think, this “looks” better

item.source: How can i change my total lvl to 126

item.title: How can i change my total lvl to 126
item.dc:creator: @Tallywack Tallywack
item.description:
@Tallywack wrote:

the easier think is to create command
add this to your comands codes

if (playerRights >= 2) {

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("allstats"))     
	{
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[1]), 1);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[2]), 2);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[4]), 4);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[5]), 5);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[7]), 7);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[8]), 8);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[9]), 9);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[10]), 10);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[11]), 11);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[12]), 12);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[13]), 13);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[14]), 14);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[15]), 15);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[16]), 16);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[17]), 17);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[18]), 18);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[19]), 19);
addSkillXP((100000000*playerLevel[20]), 20);
sendMessage("You own :P");
	}

now ::allstats give you all your skills 99, and its for admins only
